titles: An elegy in commemoration of the Right Worshipful Sir William Scroggs, late lord chief justice of His Majesties Court of Kings-Bench, who departed this life, the 25th of this instant October. 1683.
notes: Verse: "Thou pleasing muse, who late did'st gay appear ..."
Imperfect: stained, affecting text and imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Scroggs, William, --  Sir, 1623?-1683 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
